segments.text: I lost track of time , am I late ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . What kept you from arriving on time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My friend needed me to help him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I realize that everyone has emergencies ; just get here on time from now on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I appreciate you saying that and would like you to join us in our meeting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wonderful , does anyone have any questions about this project ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am confused about the projected revenues .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm glad that some of you get it , but let's go over it once more .
segments.speaker: S2
